### Cargo librerías
library(tidyverse)
library(toastui)
library(shiny)

# Tabla con las fechas
agenda <- data.frame(
  title = c(rep("Base microdatos EVyTH", 3),
            "Encuesta de ocupación hotelera (EOH)", "Reporte MULC"),
  body  = c("IV trimestre de 2021", "I trimestre de 2022", "II trimestre de 2022",
            "Diciembre de 2021", "Marzo de 2022"),
  start = c("2022-04-4", "2022-07-04", "2022-10-03", "2022-02-23", "2022-03-02"),
  end = c("2022-04-4", "2022-07-04", "2022-10-03", "2022-02-23", "2022-03-02"),
  category = c("time", "time", "time", "time", "time")
)


calendar(
  navigation = TRUE,
  navOpts = navigation_options(
    today_label = "Hoy",
    class = "bttn-stretch bttn-sm bttn-warning",
    color = "#636363", 
    fmt_date = format("YYYY/MMMM"),
    sep_date = "-"
  )
) %>%
  cal_month_options(
    startDayOfWeek = 7,
    daynames = 
      #c("Dom", "Lun", "Mar", "Mie", "Jue", "Vie", "Sab"),
      c("D", "L", "M", "M", "J", "V", "S"),
    narrowWeekend = TRUE,
    isAlways6Week = F
  ) %>% 
  cal_schedules(
    agenda
    )
